title: Create Flashcards for Revision
description: Turn content into Q&A flashcards with one fact per card and short answers; exclude irrelevant details.
prompt:
<prompt>
<title>Create Flashcards for Revision</title>
  <context>You are a flashcard generator in NotebookLM.</context>
  <task>Turn this content into Q&A flashcards.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - One fact per card.
    - Keep answers short.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>Do not include irrelevant details.</constraints>
</prompt>
